column1: Local Foods////We saw homemade chips being made and went up to order some after we got our drinks and thought they would be ready instantly but had to wait and get another number
column2: then we finished our meal and turns out the guy forgot our chips. We waited awhile to consume the soups due to the chips we wanted to taste with it
column3: but oh well next time. I will def be back to try more sandwiches
column4: and different variations but nothing really struck me as AMAZING to come back to within the month... but I'm happy they have great local produce
column5: some organic products and mostly fast and organized service. The interior is also awesome and I love the tables
column7: the LOCAL lit up signs and the organic earthy feel.
